title: AI Social Media Qualification FAQs
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our AI Social Media Qualification Agent.

faqItems.question: Is this compliant with Meta's (Facebook/Instagram) policies?
faqItems.answer: Yes, 100%. Our system uses the official Meta API for Messenger, which is the approved and compliant way to build messaging automations. Your account's safety is our top priority.

faqItems.question: Can the AI reply to comments on my posts and ads?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely. You can configure the agent to post a public reply to a comment (e.g., 'Thanks, I've just sent you a DM!') and simultaneously initiate a private conversation in their direct messages to start the qualification process.

faqItems.question: How customizable are the automated conversations?
faqItems.answer: Currently, advanced workflow and conversation customizations are only available for our Enterprise members. If you're interested in these features, please contact our team to discuss an upgrade.

faqItems.question: What happens if a user wants to speak to a real person?
faqItems.answer: Our AI can automatically schedule an appointment with your team or initiate a hot transfer to a live representative, ensuring interested leads are promptly connected to a real person without any manual intervention.
